archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0503
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a product manager, I want to always ensure I can charge the customer's registered credit/debit card for a chargeable activity they are performing, so that I'm never left in a bad debt situation (excluding interest free). For example, micropurchase call to Bahamas at $10/minute, should we reserve funds on customer's card in 5 min blocks? Micropurchase donation text should secure funds on customer's card before donation is made.
